text: He argued that it was the only place where he could be safe from Rose. "See here, Sam Nick began. "You know Fred's getting spliced. "Gone soft in the head, Sam said. "Same as Ive always said, women rule the roost and no man's safe from 'em Ought to be a better way of doing things. Take trees 99 He rattled on very happily.
